cz.opendata.tenderstats

Class PCFilingApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • cz.opendata.tenderstats.AbstractComponent
          • cz.opendata.tenderstats.PCFilingApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class PCFilingApp
extends AbstractComponent
    Component which handles reading and writing private and public events and associated actions.
    Author:
    Matej Snoha
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      (package private) class  PCFilingApp.ContractTableRow

      Holds some info about an event to be displayed as a Calls for tenders table row in frontend

      protected void addPrivateContract(UserContext uc, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String cpv1, java.lang.String cpv2, java.lang.String cpv3, java.lang.String projectID, java.lang.String deadline, java.lang.String estimatedPrice, java.lang.String estimatedPriceCurrency, java.lang.String priceIsConfidential, java.lang.String estimatedStartDate, java.lang.String estimatedEndDate, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String nuts, java.lang.String evalPrice, java.lang.String evalTech, java.lang.String evalDate, java.lang.String contactPerson, java.lang.String contactEmail, java.lang.String contactPhone, java.lang.String contactDescription)
      Adds new contract to user's private dataspace
      protected void deletePrivateContract(UserContext uc, java.lang.String contractURL)
      Deletes private contract with specified URL.
      protected void deletePublicContract(UserContext uc, java.lang.String contractURL)
      Deletes public contract with specified URL and associated notices.
      protected void doGetPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Provides RESTful service via HTTP GET and POST.

      List user's private events:
      action=getPrivateContracts, specify indexes from and to
      Get user's private events pagecount:
      action=getPrivateContractsPages

      List user's calls for tenders:
      action=getCallsForTenders, specify indexes from and to
      Get user's calls for tenders pagecount:
      action=getCallsForTendersPages

      Add new event:
      action=addPrivateContract, specify title

      Delete private event:
      action=deletePrivateContract, specify contractURL

      Withdraw public event:
      action=cancelContract, specify contractURL

      Publish private event:
      action=publishPrivateContract, specify contractURL
      protected com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model getPrivateContract(java.lang.String contractURI, java.lang.String namedGraph)
      Returns private contract as JENA model
      protected java.util.List<PCFilingApp.ContractTableRow> getPrivateContractsAsTable(UserContext uc)
      Retrieves user's private contracts from private SPARQL endpoint as a collection of table rows.
      protected java.util.List<PCFilingApp.TendersTableRow> getTendersAsTable(UserContext uc)
      Retrieves user's calls for tenders from private SPARQL endpoint as a collection of table rows.
      protected boolean publishContract(UserContext uc, java.lang.String contractURL)
      Publishes event to public data space.
